description:
This comprehensive Java Virtual Machine monitoring dashboard is the result of many years efforts learning about monitoring and instrumenting Java applications for observability (among other things).

You'll note some interesting things above and beyond the standard metrics which are Garbage Collection throughput, memory pools, and some nice graphs allowing for analysis of GC, thread states, and memory pools and bio buffer pool.

You'll even find an overview and use of this dashboard on my YouTube channel. https://youtu.be/27Yc3gdeuQ0?si=zXXFy26k7iplBRrN

panels.description: These calculations are experimental and need yet to be compared and validated against known correct results.
panels.title: GC Throughput

panels.description: These calculations are experimental and need yet to be compared and validated against known correct results.  The way it is built does not work for multiple simultaneous JVMs, so accuracy requires selecting only one.
panels.title: GC Throughput Evolution

list.description: Name of your JMX exporter scrape job
list.name: job

title: Java Virtual Machine
